meanings.definition: Involving or marked by knotty problems or difficulties.
meanings.sent1: The knottiest puzzle took me hours to solve.
meanings.sent2: The knottiest part of the math problem was understanding the formula.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the knottiest shoelaces made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her knottiest decision was whether to study abroad or stay home.
meanings.sent5: The knottiest maze in the game was impossible to navigate.

meanings.sent1: The knottiest rope was difficult to untangle.
meanings.sent2: The knottiest tree in the forest had twisted branches.
meanings.sent3: The knottiest piece of wood looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the knottiest after a windy day at the beach.
meanings.sent5: The knottiest yarn was a challenge to knit with.
